content.detailedDescription:
While heading due north on county rd 136 i noticed 2 orbs hovering about 500 to 1000 ft above the treeline ( 1 large 1 above the smaller 1 ) they were about half the size of a full moon, about 1 mile away toward the east. shortly after i saw directly in front of me what appeard as a meteor but was neon blue in color and was bright enough to light the dashboard of my car and apperd to land about 1 1/2 miles away
i was on the way to babysit my grand children when this happend. i was driving.
the size of the orbs were amazingly large compared to the stars.
i could not stop as i had to be there at 10 till 5am  was in a hurry.
i saw them out the winddow for about 15 mins as i drove on hwy 136
content.summary: 2 orbs and a neon blue meteor

content.detailedDescription: 21st june 2012, i was travelling to work.. the sunrise was spectacular, so i wound down my window and randomly took photos over my shoulder (iphone 4s). later that morning i uploaded one of the photos to facebook. i noticed an object in the photo... i reviewed the other photos and noticed that 6 of the frames had the same object in different positions of the frames.. the last 3 photos i took were stationary (waiting for lights to turn green at traffic lights)��� and they were taken 1 second apart from the meta data on the frames... you'll notice frames 492, 493 and 494 from the meta data were 1 second apart. there is no object in 492, 493 shows a faint object and 493 a clearer object.. i am a professional electronics engineer.
content.summary: Object in direction of sun at various positions photographed

content.detailedDescription: On 21st june 2012, i was travelling to work.. the sunrise was spectacular, so i wound down my window and randomly took photos over my shoulder (iphone 4s). later that morning i uploaded one of the photos to facebook. i noticed an object in the photo... i reviewed the other photos and noticed that 6 of the frames had the same object in different positions of the frames.. the last 3 photos i took were stationary (waiting for lights to turn green at traffic lights)��� and they were taken 1 second apart from the meta data on the frames... you'll notice frames 492, 493 and 494 from the meta data were 1 second apart. there is no object in 492, 493 shows a faint object and 493 a clearer object.. i am a professional electronics engineer.
content.summary: White or rellective round or spherical

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard of my house in juigalpa, chontales (nicaragua), at 00:40 with my cousin. we were looking the nightsky as we usually do with our telescope. that night the sky was covered by scattered clouds so we wouldn't see as much as usual. the only star we could see was fomalhaut, from piscis austrinus constellation. then i saw this dark triangle-shape object, with red-orange lights in each of the triangle vertices. the lights weren't too bright, but still visible. the object was darker than the nightsky dark blue. i yelled at my cousin to come over and watch the ufo but he wouldn't see anything. i drove him in the backyard for a while (at most 5 to 10 seconds) but he still didn't see the object. the ufo moved from southeast to south and i thought we couldn't see more of it. we came back to our former position in the backyard (with fomalhaut star in front of us). i was trying to explain what i saw to my cousin when we both saw exactly the same object coming from south to southeast. i was getting fast heartbeat by that time but we remained watching the ufo. the three lights were now hovering and then got closer to our backyard. we both sensed a feeling of being in the wrong place at the wrong time, the heartbeats getting faster and faster. we can describe the ufo as getting closer for the triangle-shape was getting bigger. at that moment, i can hardly describe it any different, we just wanted to get in the house, to be anyplace else. the lights, normally in the three vertices of the triangle, were now changing to a "v" shape. not that the ufo's shape changed. just the red-orange ligths. i could count six of them forming the "v". then the rest of the story isn't that hardcore. we ran like hell into our house. the flying object was clearly getting over our heads, approching at an extremly fast speed, we wouldn't have stand there any longer. it was clearly a once in a life experience. no one told the other to run, but we did at exactly the same time. we could hardly speak for a while. it has been three days now since it happened, and one cannot watch the nightsky as before.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black triangle ufo over juigalpa, nicaragua

content.detailedDescription:
Having a cigarette on the porch of my home, i had noticed what i thought was a shooting star while i had looked south. upon investigating, i had noticed that the moving star-like entity was rapidly changing it's flight path. it had maneuvered several times making an elongated figure-eight pattern. shocked at seeing how this vessel had maneuvered, i then saw a different and brighter faster-moving light, travelling on a straighter path. the maneuvering entity in question was of a faint whitish and radiating orange color. the second was a solid brighter white color. 
the maneuvering ufo had moved and changed direction too fast so as to rule out a satellite, falling debris, or any sort of human air/spacecraft. the way that the first strange light was maneuvering, along with it's speed, had frightened me because it gave me the feeling that the vessel's technology is very much so beyond human means. i eventually lost track of the vessel it's path was so erratic.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Strange movement of fast-moving lights in the sky, constantly changing direction. second light appeared minutes after noticing the first.

content.detailedDescription:
Was heading into somerville, tn where hwy 59 meets hwy 79, around 9:10pm.  suddenly saw a very bright light in the sky right above the road.  at first i thought it was the top of a radio tower, then did a double take when i remembered there were no towers in that area.

person driving stopped the car in the road to look at the light.  it was bright red and not flashing, then slowly began to change from red to white as if fading in and out.  it was then suggested that maybe the item was a flare, since it definitely appeared to be falling slowly and getting closer.  we rolled the windows down on the vehicle to see if we could hear a helicopter, everything was silent.

after watching it a while we realized it was actually spinning.  flares do not spin with color changes, so we became a bit alarmed and curious.  a car came up behind us so we pulled into an abandoned church parking lot to view it w/out being in the road.

once in the parking lot we pulled out a camera phone and began trying to take a picture but almost as soon as we did this it changed directions, moving sw very rapidly and gaining altitude as it went.  it eventually disappeared completely like the lights had just been shut off entirely.

the entire experience lasted maybe five minutes tops, but probably not that long.  it was bigger than a star or an airplane, about the same size as the red lights on top of a radio tower when you are very close to them.  it was a very exciting experience.  both the driver and i were not quite sure what to make of it and as soon as it vanished started talking at once in excitement.

whatever it was, we both know we have never seen anything like that before in our life.  ever.

we ended up with two very low quality cell phone images of the object, but it was already moving rapidly away at the time we took the photos. one picture shows it next to the moon (white object) to help with size. it was bright enough to show up when the stars present did not.
content.summary: Very bright, first thought to be flare. red/white spinning lights. suddenly shot up fast moving sw and out of site.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch smoking a cigarette i always look towards the foothills and the night sky all of a sudden bright reddish orange ball ascended up out of the foothills i immediately stood up and look through my binoculars to see if i could see if a body shape all i could see how was a bright bright red orb it slowly moved up a few degrees and then stopped at this time i noticed it was fluctuating in size and color i yelled for my son and my husband to look outside it then slowly moved to the east all this time it was below the mountains and the cloud cover but it was inside a thick level of a fog. i reached down for my phone so i could record it on video i turned my recorder on and saw it in the viewfinder and then it just disappeared. it did not move away it did not go behind a building or trees it just disappeared. the area that i witnessed this i am very familiar with it appeared right above franklin elementary school and there is no way a plane or helicopter could be flying in that low in that area. i stayed outside using my binoculars search for it but i wasn't able to find it anywhere or anything else there was no noise at all no planes no jets no helicopters in the area at the time it was still relatively light out oh i would have been able to see it if it's still there. another strange event in port angeles. i will keep a lookout for further objects.
content.summary: Large glowing ball rose up from foothills.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were driving when in front of us in the air i saw a bright light, sort of like a search light but just pointing forwards. as we drove closer, we see an aircraft with a smaller red light on one side and a bluish-white light on the other. at first it seemed as though this was a plane with wings, but it was not moving. it was hovering. it was hard to tell whether the two smaller lights were attached to wings but it looked like a disc, with the two lights on either end and the one bright light in the center. it made no sound (had had the windows open). following the bend of the road, we made a left and momentarily our view was obstructed by trees. once the trees pass, the aircraft should have been to the left, but it was gone. it dissapeared in a matter of seconds. the three main points of why i don't think this was a plane or helicopter was because the middle light was extremely bright, it was hovering and not moving, and it made absolutely no sound.

in the picture attached, the white light highest up is the unidentified object. the other lights are on the road ahead of the car.
content.summary: Bright hovering light on aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigar when i saw what i first thought was a satellite coming from the west then it slowly turned in a southern direction. i called my wife and asked to to watch it and she also saw it change direction.
content.summary: Bright light moved from west then turned to the south

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving school facing west. i was in my car, but was distracted by an exceptionally bright object in the sky. at first it seemed to be moving due south, so i braked to get a better look at what i thought must be a distant plane. when i stopped i realized the object was not moving, so i ruled it must not be a plane, yet it seemed to be hovering slightly. i thought it might be a star, but the brightness of the object seemed to intensify then dull, and it was far brighter than any star you usually see, reflective like a diamond or glass. it seemed strange, especially since it was still light out. it was weird, but i wasn't really giving it much thought. i looked to the south to check the road, literally for a second, and when i looked back up, the bright sphere had vanished. i searched the sky, but could not relocate it.
content.summary: Star-like sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in oshawa looking at stars when in the ne sky were 2 very close ufo's flashing very quick different colours then traveled slow west then 1 turned around and went back and another was in the east sky and while filming it i wanted to get the street light in the picture to show exactly where it was but when i looked at the video beside the street light was a hovering ufo with red blue white flashes and multiple orbs going into it my batteries ran out so i went in
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Multiple ufo's blinking very fast different colours coming from ne to w then a couple changed direction and 1 was hovering very close i have vid

content.detailedDescription: My family (wife and 3 boys - 8, 7 and 23 month old) and i were swimming in our pool and i looked up and noticed a bright light (slightly larger than a star) moving slowly across the sky from the west heading eastward. it looked different than anything that we might usually see like and airplane or helicopter, or anything like a shooting star.  i told my family to look at it and everyone agreed that it was different.  it didn't blink or pulse and it didn't make a noise of any kind. close to 2 minutes it seemed to slow down and then it started moving upward (ascending) fairly quickly and the bright white light changed to a reddish-orange color right before it vanished.
content.summary: Slowly moved eastward and then slowed down & ascended straight up, looked like a bright star slowly traveling eastward, then a reddish-orange as it slowed down & ascended straight up and vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was about to walk in the back door to my house. i looked up and saw what looked like a satellite but was much brighter than a normal one. there wasn't any blinking lights or anything else like noise from an airplane or helicopter. i went inside to get my girlfriend's 14 year old brother. when we went back outside it was still there on a direct path heading from nw to se. then the object slowly got dimmer and eventually disappeared. the entire event lasted for about one minute.
content.summary: It looked like a satellite heading se. at first was very bright then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out to my garage at around 10:30 and thought i noticed a medium-brightness star moving in the eastern sky.  i quit walking, stood still, and using a nearby power line as a reference, i observed that the object was stationary.  i just about dismissed it when after about 20 seconds, the "star" started moving slowly to the south.  i quickly ran into the house, retrieved some binoculars, and steadied them against the window pane looking due east.  at first, i couldn't find the object, but i did eventually located it in the se.  it either moved quickly during the time i ran into the house, or i spotted a different object.  when magnified, the object was a small orange/white sphere but had some amount of flickering blue/red colors.  i quickly compared a nearby star of the same intensity but it didn't resemble what i was looking at.  it moved northward and appeared to change directions slightly.  to my surprise, i also noticed a faint white star-like object pass by the object i was watching at a significantly faster and different trajectory (similar to the speed of a satellite).  seconds later, this occurred again, except this object was travelling at yet another trajectory.  both smaller/dimmer objects passed quickly through my field of view, and i didn't follow them because i was concentrating on the larger object.  i only saw the smaller objects on that one occasion, and they probably were barely visible to the naked eye.  the larger object then passed behind a tree in my neighbor's yard and reappeared about a minute later on the north side and stopped moving.  after about 5 minutes of hovering, it began to lose intensity and a minute later it was no longer visible. (this may have been due to some small clouds moving in, but hard to tell in the faint dusk light.)  total time of observation was around 10-15 minutes.  i am an engineer and have a good understanding of physics, avionics, etc.  i cannot come up with any rational explanation of what i saw.  it must have been swamp gas :-)  i've checked the skies every night since then but have not seen a repeat performance.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike object moving and hovering in eastern sky

content.detailedDescription: On june/23/2012 at about 10pm, i was standing outside of my house and saw what at first looked like a bright big star. as i was looking at it, a blue light about half the size of the main white light appeared then circled the light once clockwise then stopped and both lights disappeared. the next night on june/24/2012, my brother and i were in my backyard he saw a solid white light flying fairly quickly and pointed it out to me. we watched it fly for about 10 seconds then it disappeared. there were commercial planes flying lower than the light much slower than the light. it was a solid white light. it didn't have any blinking lights like airplanes and as fast as it was going, it wasn't like a shooting star. it didn't look like fire and it didn't have a trail behind it. i've seen satalites before and it didn't look like any i've seen. i'm going to be out tonight with a video camera in case it happens again.
content.summary: Two sightings in two nights

content.detailedDescription: I seen a ufo last night june 24 2012 in new london wi. 10:25 pm to be exact. it flew real low over my house. it was huge. had bright orange glowing lights it looked like a fireball in the sky. as i looked up i noticed way up in the sky two other ufo's flying around. now these were super fast they were north then south back and forth.Then the big one went up and vanished. and the two other ones went south and disappeared. so  i sat outside looking to the sky to see if i could see anything else, when a jet flew over at 11:15 real low and following the same path as the ufo.
content.summary: Sitting outside and noticed a bright fireball large craft directly above me going west very low, not a sound was made

content.detailedDescription: Appeared out of nowhere from the south as i was sitting in my familyroom with my husband watching tv. i looked out our windows and up out at the sky and my attention was immediately drawn to this globe like bright orange molten light. i knew it was not a plane, no plane i had ever seen glowed bright orange! i turned to my husband and said "did you see that?"  we both jumped up from where we were sitting and ran out our front door into our front yard. the orange fireball orb had made it's ne direction change over our house and was moving away from us, faster than any plane we had ever seen.There was also a plane heading south. we knew it was a plane with the sound of the engine and lights associated with planes. we see lots of airplane traffic since we are not far from port columbus.Our encounter lasted approximately 3-3 1/2 minutes. we watched it disappear until you couldn't see it anymore. we were in awe during our sighting, my husband and i have wondered if it wasn't meant for us to have seen something so awesome.
content.summary: globe like orange molten orb

content.detailedDescription:
At a large park waiting on 2 other people to rejoin our group. we had
watched a fireworks display. we had been to see hot air balloons do
a night glow on the ground as a group. was sitting in a lawnchair just
awaiting the others arrival when i noticed an orange glow in the sky
traveling toward where i was sitting. i could see it through some tree
branches but it started to turn and fly away from where i was sitting.
it traveled at a steady pace and steady light. at first i thought it was
a hot air balloon but i was told that balloons are not allowed to be up
in the air after dark. it was 11 pm and all balloons had been deflated and packed away before fireworks display started.

the object then just disappeared but returned a few moments later and
followed the same pattern as before made an arc turn and then disappeared.
i had the feeling it was the same object and it was circling but perhaps
it was two. it was a clear night so after it had made the turn i could
see it going away from me and then it was no longer visible like the
lights just turned off.
content.summary: Observed object come into view make a turn and disappear only to reappear a second time within a short time to do the same thing.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my truck facing ne was leaving the place i clean on my way to the bank. i saw a bright shiny object moving very fast across the sky maybe a mile away and id guess above clouds but the sky was pretty clear today. it was very sunny and bright. what really got me curious was it was spewing a chem trail but it was very short and was like disovling before it could leave a long trail. all the other things in the sky were very obviously jets leaving long chem trails. what i saw did not look like a plane. so i was driving through the parking lot watching this thing move across they sky thinking 'what kind of plane can that be?'. thats when i saw the white glowing orb like thing flying below it. it was about an inch below and just a little bit behind. they seemed to be going the same speed in the exact same direction. when i saw the orb i got really excited because i knew for sure that it was not a plane. all i could think was ' i wish i had a camera'. then i realized my phone has a camera. so i threw my truck in park and hopped out. i could not see my screen because it was too bright, so i snapped off three shots in the general area be fore i lost them behind some trees. they were moving fast. so i jumped back in my truck and turned ne onto ----- ave looking for them. i pulled into the bank just across ----- ave parked and searched the sky but they were gone. the pics on my phone were taken at 1:06pm. i went into the bank and told the teller i had just seen a ufo, she didnt believe so i didnt push the issue. my pics unfortunately have no visible proof of what i saw but my girlfriend is trying to clean them up.
content.summary: Fast cigar chased by glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: At about 2:52pm sunday june 24, 2012 i was looking at the sky from backyard toward the south. i noticed a round object about 6-7 miles south possibly over western queen creek/southern chandler coming toward me at about 2 miles elevation. first i thought it's a helicopter but it was flying too high for a helicopter & as it got closer to about 3-4 miles of me, possibly over baseline & country-club i noticed its round shape kind of like a golden/silver ball. as it reached about 60 degree angle over my head it suddenly started ascending until i couldn't see it anymore, at the last moment it was over 7-8 miles above the ground. the whole time i could see it was no more than 25-35 seconds.
content.summary: A small round, silver object at about 2mile elevation

content.detailedDescription: I was over at a friends house hanging out on their back deck near ft.Knox ky. i was looking at the stars like i usually do when i decide to follow a plane thats heading north and then my eye catches an object moving south east. at first i thought it was a falling star until i pointed it out and we all agreed that it was moving too slow to be anything like that. so we kicked around the notion that it could be a high altitude jet or a satelite...That was debunked by what happened shortly after. while saying it was way too high to be a plane and moving at that speed at that altitude youd die from the gforce and on a clear night with no clouds i simply vanished....Or changed direction to leave the atmoshere so fast my naked eye couldnt detect it. i am a very rational person and so are my friends we believe in et life and do not let our human emotions and thoughts get too wrapped up without looking at the facts...There is something happening and only certain people on a certain frequency in life will be able to pick up on it. if you come investigate i promise you wont be disappointed. thank you
content.summary: Object was star like in size and color. was moving too slow to be a falling star comet ect but way too fast to be a plane or jet and then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
It was june 5th, at night sometime around 9 40. i was in norwalk, ca watching a movie at my girlfriends house with her father, brother, cousin, my girlfriend and myself. at that time her cousin received a phone call and stepped outside so as to not disturb the movie, then after about two minutes he came quickly to the door and says "guys, come quick, you gotta see this...Come on!" 
   as he had been on the phone he saw something and came to get us, so i and everyone stood up and went outside the house in front of the garage and he pointed over the garage to the west towards the ocean and said"guys what is that?" "do you see that moving fast over there?"...
   i and everyone else there immediatley became aware of this very very bright light in the sky in the west moving quickly to the north of us. it looked like a star, it looked like the biggest star in the sky visible without a telescope, but much bright and moving fast. in a matter of about 30 seconds it made its way over the garage and quickly changed its course from north to northeast towards victorville..As it changed course we all noticed it would have busrts of speed from fast to very fast. 
   it all the time it was moving, we never saw airplane markers, signs, signals, smoke or rocket trails and it never made any sounds, all the while my father in law watched through binoculars.
   as the object turned towards the northeast it began to get smaller and smaller and it eventually dissappeared over the neighbors house. we stood there and just took the sight of what we had just witnessed all in. i personally was very shaken up by the whole event...We all were in agreement that what we had seen was not normal.
content.summary: We were called outside by a family member, he pointed us towards the west over garage, we saw a bright light moving fast..

content.detailedDescription: In office talking with co-worker ,noticed an object in sky relecting sun light through office window.Ran out with co-worker and watched object go north east then turn north,object looked as if it was spinning or a slight wobble to it and would reflect sun  than go dull grey,it was hoovering for a few seconds than dropped about 50ft and shot back up and hoovered,then went north east and slowly away from our sight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen object from office,ran out followed object with eyes disappear into distance

content.detailedDescription:
1. coming out of our garage.
2. looked up in the air when in our car.
3. a large star/ airplane.
4. seemed to move under intelligent power.
5. i love ufos, and knowing more about them, so i felt excited to see my very first ufo and didn't stop watching until i was 100% sure it was gone.
6. faded away.
content.summary: Bright, some what pulsating orange light pretty low to the ground. made 0 sound and after about 15 mins went up at an angle into the atmosphere and faded away.

content.detailedDescription: while working as a security guard i saw what ithought was a shooting star but it only lasted 3 seconds and it was at the same place and same time 5 nights in a row 4:27am it appears east to northeast about 70 degrees above horizon. it appears tobe bright lite that disappears as fast as it shows up.
content.summary: Star like same place same time

content.detailedDescription: See main report on houston mufon meetup for details
content.summary: Houston mufon meetup photos (resubmitted)

content.detailedDescription: Test entry 06.26.12
content.summary: Test entry 06.26.12

content.detailedDescription:
This is a true story, told just as it happened. 
one night (approximately january 15th, 2010, at 8:30 pm) while taking my 19 year old daughter to best buy to purchase a video game, we drove down spring creek drive from our home in our sub division, through the forest which is a deserted park, due to it being in the flood zone and had been abandoned years ago. we saw (in clear view) a large red sphere sitting on an abandoned road in the forest as we passed by the entrance to the road,  which had been blocked off by the county to prevent cars or campers from entering. as we passed by, i looked down the road and saw the craft a few hundred feet from the entrance. i slowed down to give my daughter a chance to view the craft with me and we were convinced it was a ufo sitting on the road. it was a solid red sphere, larger than a car or truck and made no sound or movement and emitted a reddish light.  due to the necessity to get to best buy before closing hours, we continued on and simply had a laugh at the thought of actually seeing a ufo in our forest.
then, on friday night, january 22, 2010 at 11:10 pm, my wife  and i watched what appeared to be the same large reddish, glowing colored sphere descend into the woods directly in front of our home from our front porch at about a tenth of a mile from our home. we first spotted it through the front window in our den, while we were watching t.V. by accident. we ran outside to the front porch to get a closer view and watched it as it descended, taking about a minute to get to the ground. 
at first sighting it was about 80 feet in the air, just above the tops of the trees already in its decent. we watched carefully looking for any signs that it could be identified as an earthly object. it made no sound at all and proved to be something we���ve never seen before. it was very stable in its control.
it was sphere shape at approx. 12 or 15 feet wide and made no noise as it carefully descended very slowly, between tree branches towards the ground, until it could no longer be seen behind the shrubs. it had no flashing lights or created any wind or disturbance of any kind.  it did have a small flickering flam at the top that went away during its decent.
i grabbed my flashlight and called my daughter to pile into the car, for a closer look, and drove around the corner to get to the road that ran next to the location it came down at. my wife stayed behind in fear of making contact with visitors. 
this forest area is an area of low level marsh land. no power is present. the trees are tall pines, oak, and other hard woods with tall youpon growth at ground level. there is a stream that runs through the center of the property usually filled with the songs of thousands of frogs but at this time, they were silent! the weather was cool with overcast and a cloud cover ceiling of about 10,000 feet. it was very calm.
 on the first pass, from our car, we were looking for the reddish glowing object that was first seen in the air. we drove to the end of the road, watching into the woods but not seeing anything. i made the block and retraced the area for a second time, driving slowly and shinning my flashlight into the forest. then we noticed a single white light deep in the forest, near the location from where the craft came down, approx. 30 yards from the edge of the road in the forest. 
it was a light, much like a light emitting from a bulb of about 60 watts but was too deep in the woods to make out its shape or intent. it looked as though it was sitting on the ground.  we watched the light for about five minutes with no movement, either around it or near it. then we slowly moved forward, shining our flashlight into the forest edge, when we noticed the outline of a curved, grayish colored, metal craft nestled behind the dense yaupon shrubbery which was about ten feet high. it emitted no light or sound. we could barely see only part of the round side as the craft was hidden behind the foliage, and we were not going in for a closer look! 
we continued to drive forward approximately another hundred and fifty feet when my flashlight caught the reflection of two very large eyes watching us through the shrubs in the forest edge, set back about 25 feet from the road. i stopped the car, rolled down the window, and shone the flashlight into its eyes and watched as it watched us for about the next several minutes. 
we noticed that the eyes were about 8 inches apart and glistened like two very large white diamonds in the reflection from my flashlight. they were about seven feet from the ground.
later observation revealed there were no objects in that area in which someone or something could have been standing on, such as a fallen tree. 
we could not see the body shape as it was very dark with no back light and whatever it was remained hidden behind the yaupon shrubs. it never blinked or turn away for a moment and made no sound or movement but continued to watch us very closely as we discussed the details of what we were seeing. we ruled out the possibility of it being a deer, or any animals of any type that would be common in the area, and being that we watched the landing of a ufo and sighted the craft just yards away from where it was, it was determined that we were looking into the eyes of an alien visitor.  
the eyes were forward facing and twinkled as they moved to view us. the iris of the eyes was large, about the size of a quarter and glistened like diamonds in my spotlight and reflected bright white in color.  we turned on the car's interior dome light and waved a couple of times to let him know we were just curious and meant no harm. we felt like he must have been alone and came to that specific area for samples of something for testing, maybe bugs from the forest floor? that could explain the light in the woods, to attract insects. we felt like he moved away from his space craft, as we got closer to it and he didn���t wish to be noticed by humans in the event we got out looking over his ship. maybe he just didn���t want to frighten us or was afraid himself!  
we felt he was rather curious by our presence, maybe even a bit frightened that we had accidently caught him landing and he wished to be left alone, so he stayed hidden. however, taking the opportunity to observe a human family in our earth bound, ���wheeled��� car, checking him out as we stayed calm.  i could feel our presence becoming un-wanted as the minuets passed by as he was probably anxious to get out of there before other showed up, maybe not so peaceful and we were taking up too much of his time. 
as we stared into those large glowing eyes for as long as we did, for some unknown reason, we turned off the flashlight and drove out of the neighborhood and away from the area for quite a distance, discussing the sight of the craft coming down and what a beautiful, majestic sight it was. only to realize we were driving for no reason away from such a monumental moment in our lives! we turned around and returned to the area only to find that he had departed, light, craft, eyes and all. we believe he sent us subliminal messages to leave him alone so he could pack up and get on his way without being detected any further. i felt the effect of confusion the next few days and found it difficult to focus my thoughts.
it was an odd feeling but, once you actually see a landing and the occupants of an alien craft, it feels very natural and like it should be left alone as it must only be our neighbors tending to their business in a natural way, and we really don���t have any place hanging about or getting in their way.  
it was a satisfying experience. it���s nice to think he is telling his story to his friends and family, in some faraway place, of the nice human family that stopped by for a brief visit while he was on his mission.  
about four days later at approx. 8.00 pm, i watched a saucer shape object moving slowly over the same patch of forest with a single, dim red pulsating light on the top at its center. the light was pulsating very slowly, much less than lights on towers or aircraft and it never completely went out between flashes. the top of the saucer was lit up bright white while the bottom of the craft was dark. there was a single beam of white light shining out of the bottom of the craft shinning downward in a cone shape, very bright but was odd in the fact that it did not shine all the way to the ground. in other words it shown down about twenty five feet then came to a clean stop in midair. i watched it until the trees hid it from view. it too made no sound.
update: exactly one year later. on the anniversary date (2-22-11) of the alien encounter, my daughter and i saw the return of what looked like the same red sphere near our neighborhood at 8:45 pm in the sky. it just appeared as we were driving north bound on i-45 approaching the spring exit, when a bright twinkling object appeared in the sky about six hundred feet off the ground next to the freeway in front of us. it appeared to have white, twinkling flames coming from its bottom moving upward over the round craft. it sparkled like a star and was moving southwards towards us at a slow speed. when we spotted it, it was completely covered with the white flames then it "suddenly" changed directions and its flames began to subside. it began to pick up speed, now moving north bound next to the freeway. my daughter reached for her phone and videoed it. we pulled over to capture the tail end of the sighting. i watch with my naked eyes as it moved away decreasing its "flame".  we could see the red sphere that we had seen in the forest on two other occasions near our home. then it just vanished from sight, like it cloaked itself from sight. before it vanished i could see a force field around the craft as it glowed slightly from the energy flame before disappearing. i am guessing that the craft with occupant had returned for an annual checkup on forest samples, etc. it was moving towards our forest near our home. we raced to the house and watched the forest for a while but didn���t see any activity.  after all, what the heck can you do in the event that we did find it again? we just felt satisfied that we had been involved with an actual ufo encounter and it���s nice to know the truth! hope to see him again soon. 

harold smith jr.
2011
content.summary: Sphere

content.detailedDescription:
During the june 23rd houston mufon meetup, i was taking pictures of the moon with my little sony mhs-cm1 5.0 mp4 camcorder.

because of the small size of my camera screen and for the darkness surrounding us during this event, i could not see the fine details of each photo until i had downloaded the photos onto my computer the next day.

as you can see on the first photo (named for the time taken at 10:10pm and 46 seconds), there is something on the top tip of the lighten moon which is cylinder in shape and has a grey color. 

you can see this object also has a shadow on the far side in line with the shadow of the moon and is sharper in detail then the moon because the moon is slightly out of focus.

the second photo was taken at 10:10 and 50 seconds and the object is less clear. maybe the object is moving closer to the moon?

the next two photos, (10:11:54 seconds and 10:12:24 seconds) i cannot see the object.
content.summary: Houston mufon meetup - moon photos

content.detailedDescription: Have seen many of these. wish i had a better camera. the red dot is a blemish in my cam. i hope my video uploads this time! :)
content.summary: Caught one on video
